Experiment.name: description

Experiment.name: outputDirPath
Experiment.label: Output Directory Path
Experiment.description: Directory path where experiment results will be saved.

Experiment.name: versionsToRun
Experiment.label: Versions to Run
Experiment.description: Select which versions of the simulation to run. Has to be defined under the same name in the versions configs.

Experiment.name: numBoids
Experiment.label: Number of Boids
Experiment.description: Total number of boids in the simulation.

Experiment.name: totalTicks
Experiment.label: Total Ticks
Experiment.description: Total number of simulation ticks for the experiment.

Experiment.name: warmupTicks
Experiment.label: Warmup Ticks
Experiment.description: Number of warmup ticks before data collection starts.

Experiment.name: initialStateTicks
Experiment.label: Initial State Ticks
Experiment.description: Number of ticks for the initial state before the simulation starts.

SimConfig.name: alignmentBasic
SimConfig.label: Alignment Weight for Basic Boids
SimConfig.description: Velocity matching with neighbors. 0 - no alignment, 100 - full alignment

SimConfig.name: cohesionBasic
SimConfig.label: Cohesion Weight for Basic Boids
SimConfig.description: Attraction to neighbors' center of mass. 0 - no cohesion, 100 - full cohesion

SimConfig.name: separationBasic
SimConfig.label: Separation Weight for Basic Boids
SimConfig.description: Repulsion from neighbors. 0 - no separation, 100 - full separation

SimConfig.name: targetAttractionBasic
SimConfig.label: Target Attraction Weight for Basic Boids
SimConfig.description: Attraction weight to the local target for basic boids. 0 - no attraction, 100 - full attraction

SimConfig.name: visionBasic
SimConfig.label: Vision Radius of Basic Boids
SimConfig.description: Perception radius for basic boids. 0 - no perception, 100 - global perception

SimConfig.name: visionPredator
SimConfig.label: Vision Radius of Predator Boids
SimConfig.description: Perception radius for predator boids. 0 - no perception, 100 - global perception

SimConfig.name: neighbourAccuracy
SimConfig.label: Neighbor Accuracy
SimConfig.description: Maximum percentage of neighbors considered when calculating boid behavior. 100 - all boids, 0 - no boids

SimConfig.name: cruisingSpeedBasic
SimConfig.label: Cruising Speed for Basic Boids
SimConfig.description: Preferred cruising speed for basic boids in percentage of their maximum speed.

SimConfig.name: maxSpeedBasic
SimConfig.label: Max Speed for Basic Boids
SimConfig.description: Maximum speed for basic boids. 0 - no movement, 100 - maximum available speed (200 units/s)

SimConfig.name: minSpeedBasic
SimConfig.label: Min Speed for Basic Boids
SimConfig.description: Minimum speed for basic boids.

SimConfig.name: cruisingSpeedPredator
SimConfig.label: Cruising Speed for Predator Boids
SimConfig.description: Preferred cruising speed for predator boids in percentage of their maximum speed.

SimConfig.name: maxSpeedPredator
SimConfig.label: Max Speed for Predator Boids
SimConfig.description: Maximum speed for predator boids. 0 - no movement, 100 - maximum available speed (200 units/s)

SimConfig.name: minSpeedPredator
SimConfig.label: Min Speed for Predator Boids
SimConfig.description: Minimum speed for predator boids.

SimConfig.name: maxForce
SimConfig.label: Max Force
SimConfig.description: Maximum steering force applied to boids. 0 - no steering, 100 - maximum steering

SimConfig.name: drag
SimConfig.label: Drag
SimConfig.description: Velocity damping factor. 0 - no drag, 100 - no movement

SimConfig.name: noise
SimConfig.label: Noise
SimConfig.description: Random velocity rotation strength.

SimConfig.name: predatorMaxStamina
SimConfig.label: Predator Max Stamina
SimConfig.description: Maximum stamina for predator boids.

SimConfig.name: predatorStaminaRecoveryRate
SimConfig.label: Predator Stamina Recovery Rate
SimConfig.description: Stamina recovery rate for predator boids.

SimConfig.name: predatorStaminaDrainRate
SimConfig.label: Predator Stamina Drain Rate
SimConfig.description: Stamina drain rate for predator boids.

SimConfig.name: mouseInteractionMultiplier
SimConfig.label: Mouse Interaction Multiplier
SimConfig.description: Multiplier for forces applied by mouse interaction.

SimConfig.name: obstacleAvoidanceMultiplier
SimConfig.label: Obstacle Avoidance Multiplier
SimConfig.description: Multiplier for obstacle avoidance forces.

SimConfig.name: bounceFactor
SimConfig.label: Obstacle Bounce Factor
SimConfig.description: Velocity reduction factor upon obstacle collision. 0 - full stop, 100 - no reduction

SimConfig.name: bounce
SimConfig.label: Bounce Walls
SimConfig.description: Bounce at world bounds (false = wrap)
